fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e1.equipments.hem

Interface PlanningEquipmentControlCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, StandardEquipmentControlCI

    public interface PlanningEquipmentControlCI
extends StandardEquipmentControlCI
    The component interface PlanningEquipmentControlCI defines the operations that a controller can perform on an equipment which can have planned programs.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      (startTime() == null) == (duration() == null)
 invariant      (startTime() == null) == (deadline() == null)
 invariant      (forall Duration d) (startTime() == null) == !postpone(d)
 invariant      (startTime() == null) == !cancel()

    Created on : 2020-09-24

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean cancel()
      cancel the planned program, returning true if the operation succeeded or false otherwise.
      java.time.LocalTime deadline()
      return the time at which the current planned program must finish or null if none has been planned.
      java.time.Duration duration()
      return the time at which the current planned program will start or null if none has been planned.
      boolean hasPlan()
      return true if the equipment currently has a planned program.
      boolean postpone(java.time.Duration d)
      postpone the start time of the planned program by the given duration, returning true if the operation succeeded or false otherwise.
      java.time.LocalTime startTime()
      return the time at which the current planned program will start or null if none has been planned.

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e1.equipments.hem.StandardEquipmentControlCI

        currentMode, downMode, off, on, setMode, upMode

        boolean postpone(java.time.Duration d)
